---
Song: vAzha vaiTHa
Film: aboorva sagOthararkaL
---
Notes: s r2 g2 m1 p d2 n2 S

vAzha vaiTHa kAdhalukku jE
s s   s  s   r r  r  g  s

vAlibaTHin pAdalukkum jE
s s s s    r r r  g   s

thoodhu vitta kaNgaL unnai thEduthE ambu vitta kAmanukkum jE
R   G   S  p  d  n   p s   r  g s   R G  S  p  d n p  s   rg

vAsamuLLa pooveduTHu thoovudhE nam vAsal vandha thendralukku jE
R G S  p  d  n p s   r   g s   S   R G   S  p   d    n p  s  rg

Stanza 1:
nANamennai vittuCHE mOham ennai thottuCHE kai aNaikka kai aNaikka 
p p p  p   p  p p   p p   p p   p   p p   s   gr   g  s   gr   g

kanni vizhi pattuCHE kALai manam kettuCHE mei aNaikka mei aNaikka 
p  p  p p   p  p p   p p   p p   p  p p   s   gr   g  s   gr   g

kaLLOdum muLLOdum thaLLAdum sempoovai neeyum aLLa ammammA ennannu rasiCHEn 
s  r g   r  g m   g   m d   m  d  n   S  n   d m  s r  g  r g  m  d m mr g

munnAlum pinnAlum muTHAdum innEram mOham koNdu appappA thappukku thaviCHEn 
s  r g   r  g m   g m  d   m d n   S n   d  m  s r  g  r   g  m  d  m mr g

pArvaidhanil nALum neendhum pAvai oru meenACHE 
S  S  S  S   S S   S   SG   G G   GG  RG S S

dhEgam thanai nALum moodum Adai ingu noolACHE 
S  S   S  S   S S   S  SG  GG   G G  RG S S

(vAsamuLLA)

Stanza 2: (notes similar to Stanza 1)

thEn mazhaiyum kottuCHE dhEgam engum pattuCHE vetkam vittu pakkam niRkka 
peN manadhu anjiCHE pOdhum endru kenjiCHE vanji ennai konja konja 
peN madi ponn madi mannavan koNdAdum nEram enna solladi solladi sindhiCHE 
pon magaL poo magaL enmanam ennALum thanjamendru unnidam unnidam vandhuCHE 
vAdai ena nAnum vandhEn vAzhai madal thOdhACHE 
vAri enai nAnum thandhEn vAlibam dhAn nOyACHE 
(vAsamuLLA)
